education_text.0: As a year student at      Harvard University Harvard University in fall 1970, Stallman was known for his strong performance in   As a year student at      Harvard University Harvard University in fall 1970, Stallman was known for his strong performance in   Stallman considered staying on at Harvard, but instead decided to enroll as a graduate student at the      Massachusetts Institute of Technology Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)While working (starting in 1975) as a research assistant at MIT under      Gerald Jay Sussman Gerry Sussman,          Stallman published a paper (with Sussman) in 1977 on an AI      redirect    Truth maintenance system truth maintenance system, called directed backtrackingIn 1991,      Linus Torvalds Linus Torvalds, a      Finnish student, used the GNU's development tools to produce the free      Monolithic kernel monolithic      Linux kernel Linux kernelIn August 2006, at his meetings with the government of the Indian State of      Kerala, he persuaded officials to discard proprietary software, such as Microsoft's, at run schoolsFor a period of time, Stallman used a notebook from the      One Laptop per Child One Laptop per Child programStallman has also helped and supported the      International Music Score Library Project International Music Score Library Project in getting back online, after it had been taken down on October 19, 2007, following a      Cease and desist cease and desist letter from      Universal Edition Universal EditionIn August and September 2019, it was learned that      Jeffrey Epstein Jeffrey Epstein had made donations to MIT, and in the wake of this,      MIT Media Lab MIT Media Lab director      Joi Ito Joi Ito resigned
